data.description:
Meet the Ludus app – the fitness coach that builds, refines and guides you through personalized workouts.

With Ludus, you don't need a gym to break a sweat. Home or away, even if you’ve only got 10 minutes, you can complete your workout with no trouble at all. Burn calories and train your body with interactive video workouts – using nothing but your own bodyweight! Ludus helps you build up your endurance, gain strength and feel good all day long.

At the beginning of each session you'll see a preview of your exercises. When you strap your phone around your arm, Ludus will start counting your repetitions. Improve your accuracy by connecting your Pebble Watch to the app. It’ll tell you when you hit the right posture, showing your avatar following your moves live on your Apple TV screen.

In order to plan your next workout, Ludus will ask you to rate how you feel after each exercise. It’s designed to evolve with you and your goals!
After each session, you’ll see a summary of how you did. You can comment and share your progress – along with any badges you've earned – with your friends. Ludus will keep track of your training journal so you can focus on your workouts.

Ludus is here to help you kick off your fitness journey. It’s about more than just exercising – it's about improving every day. Start now!
